title: OMG
body: I am trying to play LOL with update 7.23 and i CANT. It loads my champion until 23% and then it sends me a message telling me that my connection losts(my connection is ok).What can i do??????Please fix it.

replies.body: Hey, your connection seems to be cutting off from our services.  Stick to customs for now, and run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix that up.
I have the same problem I don't know what to do!
